actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deduction from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases the amount of outside earnings which is permitted an individual each year without any deduction from benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance Benefits) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deduction from benefits thereunder.
